title: Oracle debt spirals toward 2008-era danger zones, Morgan Stanley sounds the alarm; Is ORCL still a buy before earnings?
description: Oracle debt is spiraling toward 2008-era danger, with five-year CDS jumping to 125 bps and possibly hitting 200 bps in 2026 as AI spending soars. Oracle’s debt has surged to $104 billion in FY2025 and may hit $290 billion by FY2028 as free cash flow turns neg…
content: Oracle is facing a rare and intensifying credit squeeze that separates it from other major hyperscalers. The companys debt load has surged to more than $104 billion in fiscal year 2025. Thats up from… [+7076 chars]
